title: Responsive Layout Adjustment on Desktop
description: Verify that the website layout adjusts fluidly and correctly on a desktop screen size without overlapping or misaligned elements.

steps.description: Open the homepage on a desktop browser with 1920x1080 resolution
Check that all sections, including navigation bar, service icons, media updates, newsletter subscription, and footer are properly aligned and accessible

title: Responsive Layout Adjustment on Tablet
description: Verify the website layout fluidly adjusts and remains user-friendly on tablet screen sizes between 768px and 1024px width.

steps.description: Open the homepage on a tablet device or browser emulator with 800x1024 resolution
Verify that the navigation bar, dropdown menus, service icons, embedded videos, newsletter form, and footer display correctly without UI glitches

title: Responsive Layout Adjustment on Mobile
description: Verify the website layout fluidly adjusts and remains navigable on mobile screen sizes below 480px width.

steps.description: Open the homepage on a mobile phone or browser emulator at 375x667 resolution
Verify that the navigation bar collapses into toggle menu and that all content including service sections, embedded videos, newsletter form, and footer are fully visible and usable

title: Mobile Navigation Dropdown Toggle Functionality
description: Verify that the mobile navigation toggle button reveals and hides the dropdown menu smoothly without UI glitches.

steps.description: Open the website on a mobile device or emulator
Tap the navigation toggle button
Check that the dropdown navigation menu slides down and all menu items are visible
Tap the toggle button again
Check that the dropdown navigation menu smoothly collapses

title: Service Section Icon and Description Accuracy
description: Verify that the service sections display the correct icons and concise information as per the original NGO design.

steps.description: Navigate to the services section on homepage
Ensure each service block contains a Font Awesome icon matching the welfare program and the description text is concise and visible

title: Embedded YouTube Video Playback and Responsiveness
description: Verify that embedded YouTube videos in the media updates section play smoothly and are responsive to screen size changes.

steps.description: Navigate to the media updates section
Verify the YouTube video is present and visible
Play the embedded YouTube video
Video plays without buffering or UI errors
Resize browser window to tablet and mobile sizes
Video resizes correctly maintaining aspect ratio and remains playable

title: Newsletter Subscription Form Email Validation - Valid Email
description: Verify that the newsletter subscription form accepts a properly formatted email and submits successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the Saylani Guide section with the newsletter subscription form
Input a valid email address (e.g., test@example.com) into the subscription email field
Click on the subscribe button
Verify successful submission confirmation or message

title: Newsletter Subscription Form Email Validation - Invalid Email
description: Verify that the newsletter subscription form rejects invalid email addresses and displays relevant error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the subscription form
Input invalid email addresses one by one (e.g., 'test', 'test@', 'test@.com')
Attempt to submit the form
Verify that the form prevents submission and displays appropriate validation error messages

title: Footer Content Accuracy and Social Media Links Functionality
description: Verify that all footer elements including contact info and social media links are present, accurate, and functional.

steps.description: Scroll to the footer section on any page
Check that contact information is complete and matches the original site details
Verify that social media icons are visible with Font Awesome icons
Click each social media link
Ensure each link opens the corresponding social media page in a new tab

title: Cross-Browser Compatibility Check
description: Verify website functionality and appearance are consistent across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers.

steps.description: Open homepage on latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge browsers
Verify navigation bar, dropdown toggles, service sections, embedded media, newsletter form, and footer render correctly and function identically

title: Navigation Link Accessibility and Correct Routing
description: Validate that all navigation links including About page and other primary links direct users to correct pages without errors.

steps.description: Click each link in the navigation menu (desktop and mobile toggle)
Ensure user is routed to the appropriate page and page contents load correctly
Verify About page displays correct organizational information matching the original site

title: Image and Icon Optimization Check
description: Ensure that all images including icons and footer images are optimized for fast load times without quality degradation.

steps.description: Load homepage and relevant pages containing images
Verify images load quickly on different network speeds and remain visually clear without distortions

title: Font Implementation Verification
description: Verify that the website uses Google Fonts Montserrat and Poppins correctly across all textual elements with consistent styling.

steps.description: Open multiple pages and inspect textual elements
Confirm font-family matches Montserrat and Poppins as specified and fonts render clearly

title: Media Query Breakpoints Validation
description: Test the website at specified media query breakpoints to ensure adaptive layout changes activate correctly.

steps.description: Resize browser window or use device emulators to test breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Check that layout adjustments such as navigation toggle and service section reflow occur exactly at specified media query widths

title: Toggle Menu Accessibility Keyboard Navigation
description: Verify that the mobile toggle menu is accessible via keyboard interaction (tab, enter keys).

steps.description: Open site in mobile resolution or emulator
Use tab key to navigate to the toggle button
Press Enter/Space to activate toggle menu
Dropdown menu opens and items are reachable via keyboard navigation
